meanings.definition: The act of providing or using gears
meanings.sent1: The gearings in the clock help it keep time.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic adjusted the gearings in the car engine.
meanings.sent3: The gearings in the toy robot made it walk in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like intricate gearings, always turning and adjusting.
meanings.sent5: The gearings of the old bicycle creaked as it moved forward.

meanings.definition: The arrangement or system of gears in a machine
meanings.sent1: The gearings of the bike allowed it to climb steep hills easily.
meanings.sent2: The gearings in the clockwork toy were delicate and precise.
meanings.sent3: The gearings in the vending machine got stuck, causing snacks to get jammed.
meanings.sent4: The gearings of the factory operated smoothly, producing goods efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The gearings of the windmill turned gracefully in the breeze.
